Object.Name: nuSIM
Object.Description1: This device management object represents a nuSIM integrated SIM according to NTS.01 - nuSIM Integrated SIM Specification.

Item.Name: EID
Item.Description: Contains the unique identifier of the nuSIM.

Item.Name: ICCID
Item.Description: Contains the ICCID of the currently loaded nuSIM profile.

Item.Name: nuSIM Capabilities
Item.Description: Contains the supported nuSIM specification version and optional capabilities of the nuSIM.

Item.Name: nuSIM Cert
Item.Description: Contains the individual nuSIM certificate CERT.NUSIM.ECDSA, if available.

Item.Name: nuSIM Profile
Item.Description: Points to an instance of the nuSIM profile object which is to be loaded by executing Load Profile, see Resource 5.

Item.Name: Load Profile
Item.Description: Loads the profile instance referenced in Resource 4 to nuSIM.

Item.Name: Load Profile Result
Item.Description: Contains the result of the last Load Profile operation: 0=successful, 1=not successful, other values are implementation-specific.
